name: markdown-to-rich-text
title: Markdown to Rich Text
description: Transform Markdown text into richly formatted RTF, enhancing readability and style for pasting into other applications.
author: yazanzaid00

preferences.name: pandocPath
preferences.title: Pandoc Path
preferences.description: Specify the file path to your Pandoc installation for Markdown conversion.
preferences.tooltip: Enter the file path to your Pandoc installation.

preferences.name: fontFamily
preferences.title: Font Family
preferences.description: Specify the font family for the converted text.

preferences.name: fontSize
preferences.title: Font Size
preferences.description: Enter the font size for the converted text (10-36).

preferences.name: textColor
preferences.title: Text Color
preferences.description: Specify the text color for the converted text.

preferences.name: useExternalCss
preferences.title: Use External CSS File
preferences.description: Toggle this if you want to use an external CSS file instead of the specified styles.
preferences.label: Use External CSS

preferences.name: cssHtmlPath
preferences.title: CSS HTML Path
preferences.description: Specify the file path to your custom CSS HTML file that styles the converted Markdown text.
preferences.tooltip: Enter the file path to your custom CSS HTML file.

preferences.name: pasteAfterCopy
preferences.title: Paste After Copy
preferences.description: Toggle this if you want to paste the text into the foreground application after copying it to the clipboard.
preferences.label: Paste After Copy

commands.name: index
commands.title: Convert Markdown to Rich Text
commands.description: Easily convert Markdown text to richly formatted RTF, ready for use in your documents and notes.
